reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful. The size and quality receive mixed feedback, with some saying it's true to size and well-made, while others report sizing issues and poor construction.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: Looked just as pictured. Size does run, I would say, one size small. (I usually wear a six but had to wear an eight). Still looked beautiful and sequin lasted through the night. Great product for the price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!!!
items.body: This dress was worth it. True to size and beautiful! Read more
items.author: Meka

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good quality BUT
items.body: Really good quality, BUT, size up one of you can. Iâ€™m normally a size 14, but based off other reviews, itâ€™s better to size up one. I on the other hand had to get alterations done because the arm sleeves and the back of the dress, shoulder to shoulder, was made poorly. The measurements were off, and i could barely lift my arms up because of how it was sewn, which then caused the zipper to only sip up a little above mid back, causing restrictions to your underarms and chest area. Just be aware of that. I also dyed the lace to match my skin tone better, it came with a really white tan color. I also cut off a little bit of the lace as well so it wasnâ€™t choking me. Overall, the dress was sturdy, great pattering, long, and good quality. I was quite the envy and tons of compliments!!! Loved it so much! Read more
items.author: Summer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too heavy
items.body: This is too much material, it's so heavy. I returned Read more
items.author: Brannel fodje

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Evening Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Evening Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Fluorescent Green, Burgundy, Black, Champagne, Orange, Red, Silver, Pink, White, Yellow, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, White-2. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
